lines.i: This section identifies the living arrangements for a client/patient. This class may have overlaps with FamilySocialHistoryArea so this may go away.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] code with data type Code
The value sets for this attribute are based on the HL7 Living Arrangements coding system (2.16.840.1.113883.5.63) used to specify whether the patient is homeless, transient, living in a community shelter, or institutionalized.
